docs.title: Home
docs.text: Welcome! This site keeps track of the local Open Mic Poetry events in Austin and the surrounding area.

docs.title: Sundays
docs.text: Spoken and Heard Open Mic Kick Butt Coffee 5775 W Airport Blvd. 7-10 PM

docs.title: Mondays
docs.text: Convergent Arts Open Mic Freddos ATX Corner of South Congress and Oltorf St. 7-10 PM

docs.title: Fridays
docs.text: Casa de Luz Open Mic held at the 3rd Eye Lounge 8:30-10 PM

docs.title: Other Cool Events
docs.text: Crate Diggers & Beatmakers of Austin Meetup Typically held at the Capital Factory, Downtown Austin 701 Brazos St. (see Meetup Link for details) Every 2nd Tuesday
